title: U.N. SEPARATED COUNTRIES HAVE NO RELEVANCE TO SRI LANKA THE HINDU TELLS KARUNANIDHI
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana Attacking Muthuvel Karunanidhi the leader of the DMK for asking for the separation of Sri Lanka and create Eelam through UN intervention the Hindu newspaper in no uncertain terms said the cases of Montenegro, South Sudan, East Timor and Kosovo where the UN intervened have no relevance to Sri…
